title: Inova Primary Care - Crystal City
description: Inova Primary Care - Crystal City is conveniently located at the corner of S. Glebe Rd. and Richmond Hwy, located above Harris Teeter near Reagan National Airport.
cleaned_text: Extended Scheduling Hours by Phone - Evenings and Weekends Prefer to schedule your appointment by phone? We have extended our call-in scheduling hours, and our team members are ready to assist you: - Monday - Friday, 7 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. - Saturday, 8 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. [Get Directions](https://maps.google.com?q=3600%20S.%20Glebe%20Rd%20%23110%20Arlington%20VA%2022202)Phone: [571-665-6480](tel:5716656480)Fax: 571-665-6481 Inova Primary Care - Crystal City is a family medicine practice serving patients of all ages, from infants to adults. We are conveniently located at the corner of S. Glebe Rd. and Richmond Hwy, located above Harris Teeter near Reagan National Airport. Our primary care office is dedicated to providing compassionate healthcare to our community. The practice works closely in coordination with Inova's extensive network of hospitals and outpatient facilities. Translation services are available for our patients. Please contact the office prior to your appointment.
